item.description:
We are planning to meet at 6pm for a concert by GOZA a salsa group.  The concert starts at 6:30pm but there is limited parking so we are suggesting arriving by 6pm.  You will need to bring your own chair or a blanket to sit on.  If you like you can bring something to eat and drink for yourself.

 

IN CASE OF RAIN, THE CONCERT WILL BE HELD IN THE POND HOUSE.

Information about GOZA:  GOZA ( Spanish for Joy) performs exciting music and dance rhythms from Latin America, Brazil and Spain.

The band features guitar, horns, violin, bass, percussion and beautiful, romantic vocals. Goza rhythms include: salsa, cha-cha, samba, rumba, cumbia, flamenco, bossa , tango, bolero and Latin Jazz.  At any performance you will enjoy the songs of the Buena Vista Social Club, Tito Puente, Gipsy Kings, Jobim, Gardel and Piazzola plus arrangements of Beatles, Santana, Stevie Wonder, Van Morrison, Guns & Roses and original tunes.
item.how_to_find_us: There will be signs for Spanish Meet Up

group.name: The Hartford Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: Concert at Elizabeth Park
